title: Isaac and Izzy's Magical Maples
description: Autumn is painting the world in vibrant colors, and Isaac and Izzy want to give back to their favorite magical maple tree. A normal present won't do, though. They want to give him the sweetest gift of all-a friend!But are all the efforts of the kids and the animals who live near the tree enough to create a bit of magic...or will the Sugar Maple have to lend them a helpful branch once again?
author: Angela Henderson
